channel.title: Nyanx 508 [Ready to host]
channel.description:
Hello everyone today I will be releasing Nyanx 508 one of my latest projects I have been working on.
Some heads-up: When using Eclipse files in bin are deleted so make sure you back up the com and data folder. You might need a good VPS Highscores are finished (Server Sided) You might need to improve shops Some modifications to Make-Over mage (Sometimes he works sometimes color doesn't change) You will also need to add all skills Combat is a little rubbish but much better than before Magic and possibly range projectiles might need some work
Features: Slightly Improved Combat Highscores finished Server sided Can hold at least 100 people Ready to host (Just download change name and host) Summoning works Woodcutting works Firemaking works (Will need some work)
Pictures: [img]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/8366/b9e9a12944604152a2fe603.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/HPBUYRK.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Zsdtq8U.png[/img] [img]http://img715.imageshack.us/img715/5488/f2f1e1ff984b4ba7887547e.png[/img] [img]http://img600.imageshack.us/img600/8177/6a76cae9b01344989d2c04e.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/BPxm3xt.png[/img] [img]http://img577.imageshack.us/img577/6225/5905b4969bf2435e9c68602.png[/img] [img]http://img713.imageshack.us/img713/2388/f9b0d16aee074926a308496.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/tU3HIyS.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/LcaBMlR.png[/img] [img]http://img542.imageshack.us/img542/4977/480712a1eaac445098bf040.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/wmhj6j0.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/rhvzTYN.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/BD7pmTx.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/8DqRX4F.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/38otMI3.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/myL8FgN.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/IYLqGoR.png[/img]
Downloads: Source: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/29265393/Nyanx%20508.zip Client: http://www.mediafire.com/download/kg4tncrgncm/508LDFree.rar

item.title: Nyanx 508 [Ready to host]
item.dc:creator: @tehjamdude tehjamdude
item.description:
@tehjamdude wrote:

[quote=“Mezzyscape562, post:8, topic:519936”][quote author=kingcobra805 link=topic=638429.msg4303929#msg4303929 date=1369457075]

[quote author=Mikeyzzz link=topic=638429.msg4303525#msg4303525 date=1369391693]

don’t seem ready to host. also dont see nothing new…use some creativity people need to stop trying to copy runescape & learn to fly a different direction because them are the servers who make great progress.
[/quote][quote author=kingcobra805 link=topic=638429.msg4303397#msg4303397 date=1369363219]
don’t seem ready to host. also dont see nothing new…use some creativity people need to stop trying to copy runescape & learn to fly a different direction because them are the servers who make great progress.
[/quote][quote author=Musta leka link=topic=638429.msg4303484#msg4303484 date=1369382218]
Server is killed :eek:
[/quote]Sad, both of you are sad. Leave.

Mezzy great release mate, thanks for the contribution.

well server is really killed no run.bat or anything
[/quote]Well then, that’s my bad hehe.

you are really stupid tbh. you guy’s think a server is bad because of no batch file? it’s called write your own or use eclipse ide like a real programmer would; @Mikeyzzz learn your own shit before saying who can and cant be here you illiterate leecher. i gave my opinion simple as that.

And I appreciate your opinion I will make sure that I will fix all of those mistakes in the future, and Mikeyzzz The bat should be in the source folder and have u taken a moment to check the cmd folder…[/quote]

Love the server, great release Mezzy

Read full topic

item.title: Nyanx 508 [Ready to host]
item.dc:creator: @Mezzyscape562 Mezzyscape562
item.description:
@Mezzyscape562 wrote:

Hello everyone today I will be releasing Nyanx 508 one of my latest projects I have been working on.

Some heads-up:
When using Eclipse files in bin are deleted so make sure you back up the com and data folder.
You might need a good VPS
Highscores are finished (Server Sided)
You might need to improve shops
Some modifications to Make-Over mage (Sometimes he works sometimes color doesn’t change)
You will also need to add all skills
Combat is a little rubbish but much better than before
Magic and possibly range projectiles might need some work

Features:
Slightly Improved Combat
Highscores finished Server sided
Can hold at least 100 people
Ready to host (Just download change name and host)
Summoning works
Woodcutting works
Firemaking works (Will need some work)

Pictures:

HPBUYRK.png762×495

Zsdtq8U.png765×500













38otMI3.png765×501

myL8FgN.png764×506

IYLqGoR.png757×497

Downloads:
Source: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/29265393/Nyanx%20508.zip
Client: http://www.mediafire.com/download/kg4tncrgncm/508LDFree.rar

Read full topic
